1. Governor Newsom signs SB 53, advancing California's world-leading artificial intelligence industry | Governor of California  California State Portal (.gov)
  2. Gavin Newsom signs first-in-nation AI safety law  Politico
  3. Newsom signs bill targeting Google, Meta, OpenAI and Anthropic  SFGATE
  4. California Signed A Landmark AI Safety Law. What To Know About SB53.  Tech Policy Press
  5. California Governor Signs Sweeping A.I. Law  The New York Times
